name: Crostini
author: BPENDILL
summary: This is a crispy, flavorful way to serve a baguette that is so pretty it is perfect for entertaining!
ingredients: 1  French baguette, cut into diagonal 1/2 inch slices
directions: Set the oven to broil at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
In a small saucepan, combine the olive oil, butter and garlic
Set over medium heat, and cook until butter has melted and the mixture starts to bubble
Dip each slice of bread into the garlic mixture, turning to coat each side
Place Parmesan cheese on a plate
Press one side of each piece of bread into the cheese, and place cheese side up on a baking sheet
Broil on the middle rack of the preheated oven for about 8 minutes, or until golden brown
